page.title: 10PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: In the area are many{public houses. People visit them from out of the village areas.Snacks and meals are available. The{restaurant at the {Crown, Hallow}is well known in the area and barbeques are held in the Summer.{The Camp Inn,Grimley}is popular as it is located by the{River {Severn.}Here there are peacocks,ducks and geese which are kept as pets. {Opening hours}are from about 12.00am to 2.00pm,6.30pm to 11.00pm .The most popular{drinks}are, for men lager or beer and for women fruit juices .There are{games}provided for customers such as bar billiards, darts, dominoes, chess, cards and lawn skittles.There are many jobs to be done running a public house and the staff have to clean the bottles,glasses and sort out the drinks. Stores are usually kept in the cellar.
